About Chefs Tour

Founded in 2005 by travel enthusiasts Chef Romain Bapst and Mr. Martin O'Dee, our boutique tours offer an unparalleled experience of Europe's hidden gems. With a maximum of 8 guests per tour, we ensure personalized service and exclusive access to unique culinary and cultural experiences.

Explore Europe's culture, cuisine, and wines with our expert travel planners and guides, dedicated to creating unforgettable memories.

READ MORE
